CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: apparently the first seconds of this tape were lost as CHI , MOT and INV are already standing in the room at the start of the tape
INV explains warm-up task to MOT . CHI walks around and explores the toys on the floor . INV leaves the room .
MOT hangs her coat up on the wall
<bef> CHI turns around and looks up towards door . <aft> CHI looks down at the toys on the floor
MOT walks over to the chair next to the desk
CHI bends down and picks up a block
<aft> CHI puts the block in his mouth
<bef> CHI takes the block out of his mouth . CHI walks towards MOT
<aft> MOT moves her bag beside her and out of CHI's view
CHI throws the block on the floor
<bef> CHI walks across the room . CHI picks up the jack+in+the+box and hands it to MOT
MOT takes the jack+in+the+box and looks at CHI
CHI still has his hand raised and ready for action
MOT points to the handle and looks at CHI
CHI grabs the handle and tries to turn it
CHI tries to turn the handle with his other hand
CHI looks at the handle closely
CHI puts both hands on the jack+in+the+box and pushes it down
MOT puts the jack+in+the+box on the floor
<aft> MOT turns the handle until it pops
CHI stands still and bends his head as he watches the jack+in+the+box
MOT leans back and throws up her hands in excitement
CHI hesitates about one second and then starts pulling the clown by the head
<bef> MOT folds her arms on her lap . MOT watches CHI
CHI gently pulls the clown's head back and forth
MOT extends her hand to help CHI and then quickly retracts it
the clown pops up as soon as CHI lets go
CHI tries unsuccessfully to turn the handle so instead he violently shakes the jack+in+the+box around on the floor
MOT reaches out to help CHI and pulls back quickly
CHI lets go of the jack+in+the+box and then picks it up by the head of the clown and throws it across the floor
CHI walks across the room to the jack+in+the+box
<bef> CHI picks up the jack+in+the+box and throws it on the floor again . CHI bends down and touches the jack+in+the+box
CHI throws the jack+in+the+box on the floor again . <aft> CHI holds the jack+in+the+box down with one hand and wiggles the head back and forth with the other
MOT does not wait for permission
MOT pulls the jack+in+the+box away from CHI
MOT pushes the clown in the box
CHI walks over to the jack+in+the+box slowly
MOT closes the cover of the jack+in+the+box
CHI bends down and puts his hand on the handle of the jack+in+the+box
MOT is asking whether CHI agrees with what she is doing
CHI tries to turn the handle
CHI starts to turn the handle
CHI stops turning handle and picks up the jack+in+the+box
CHI hands the jack+in+the+box to MOT
MOT takes the jack+in+the+box and holds it out to CHI
CHI turns the handle briefly and then stops
CHI tries to turn the handle
CHI turns and looks at the other toys on the floor
CHI's hand is still on the handle
CHI looks at the toys on the floor
CHI turns quickly and looks at MOT
CHI lets go of the handle briefly and then starts to turn it again
<bef> CHI stops turning the handle . CHI puts his hand on the top of the jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI turns the handle briefly and then walks away
MOT starts to lower the jack+in+the+box to the floor
MOT puts the jack+in+the+box on the floor
CHI tries to turn the handle again
MOT leans over and looks at CHI
CHI turns and looks at the other toys on the floor
CHI puts his hand on the book . <aft> CHI picks the book up
CHI walks across the room to MOT with the book
<bef> MOT nods . <aft> MOT puts out her hands encouraging CHI to hand the book to her
CHI stands in front of MOT and stares at the book in his hands
CHI turns the book around and accidentally drops it on the floor
CHI goes over and starts to turn the handle of the jack+in+the+box again
CHI picks up the jack+in+the+box and hands it to MOT
MOT takes the jack+in+the+box from CHI
<aft> MOT starts to turn the handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks up and points to the wall
MOT looks up at the wall
CHI points to the wall again . <aft> CHI looks at MOT
CHI reaches for the handle of the jack+in+the+box
MOT points to a different part of the same wall
CHI looks up at the wall
CHI looks up at the wall
CHI reaches for the handle as he stares at the wall
MOT puts the jack+in+the+box on the floor
MOT points to something on the wall
MOT's upper half is out of camera view
CHI points to different place on the wall
MOT picks up the toy football on the floor and holds it out to CHI
CHI takes the football and puts it in his mouth as he walks over to the chair
CHI drops the football on the floor
MOT looks at something on the floor
CHI looks down at the ball
MOT reaches for something on the floor
CHI turns to see what MOT is doing
CHI takes a few steps towards MOT
MOT picks up a book off the floor
<aft> MOT points to the book and looks up at CHI
CHI stares blankly at the book
MOT opens the book . <aft> MOT turns a page
CHI looks briefly at both pages
<aft> MOT moves the page back and forth briefly
MOT is requesting CHI turn pages more slowly
MOT looks at the next page
on assumption that MOT is pointing to same picture as CHI
MOT points to different place on the page
MOT points to the place on the page where CHI was looking
CHI bends down and half-heartedly attempts to pick up the other book on the floor
<bef> MOT puts the other book on the floor
MOT points to the book and looks at CHI
CHI looks at the book MOT put down
<bef> CHI walks over to the book . <1u-1u .> CHI hands the book to MOT
<aft> MOT open the book and turns the page

INV enters the room at 09:23:41 to explain Small Scale Activity to MOT then leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place . INV re-enters at 09:30:24 and explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table . INV gives CHI the slinky toy to hold
INV takes the object out of the drawer
CHI turns around and watches INV
INV puts the object on the table and lets go of it
CHI immediately grabs for the object
<aft> MOT grabs the base of the object and tries to push it away from CHI
MOT pushes the object further away
MOT pushes with her other hand towards CHI
CHI raises his hands excitedly and smiles
MOT leans forwards and looks at CHI
CHI has one hand on each cheek
MOT points to CHI's hands for about a second
MOT shakes her head no gently and looks at CHI
CHI turns back to face the object and looks at it
MOT tries to remove CHI's hands from the object
CHI continues to touch the object
MOT pulls CHI's hands off the object
MOT looks CHI . <4> MOT glances up at the object and then to CHI
<aft> CHI looks down at the slinky and then up at the object again
CHI keeps his hands on the slinky and looks down
< .1-1> CHI looks up at the object
CHI smiles and looks at INV
both of CHI's hands are on the slinky in his lap
MOT leans forward and looks at CHI
CHI seems to be talking to himself as his lips move but no sound is audible
CHI looks down at the floor
CHI throws the slinky off of the table
CHI looks at the slinky on the floor and then reaches for the object
MOT gently pushes CHI's hands back
MOT puts her hands on her lap and looks at CHI
CHI reaches out for the toys INV has in her hands and then touches the object
<aft> INV stands up with the toys from Small Scale Activity and puts them on the desk
<$=2> MOT pokes gently at CHI's hands to deter him
<bef> INV lays the toys on the desk
CHI turns very quickly and watches INV
<aft> INV puts the object back in the drawer
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes and leaves room .
CHI takes the ball out of the box
<bef> MOT hold box so CHI can easily remove the ball
CHI bounces the ball excitedly on the floor
CHI walks towards MOT and then back towards the door
MOT hold her hands out to catch the ball
CHI drops the ball and takes a few steps towards the door
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI kicks the ball gently and almost falls over
CHI follows the ball across the room
CHI kicks the ball under the chair
MOT reaches out to help CHI get the ball
CHI pulls the ball out from underneath the chair
MOT retrieves the ball then she moves over by the door and holds the ball out to CHI
<aft> MOT drops the ball on the floor and rolls it to CHI
the ball bounces off of CHI's feet
<bef> CHI bends over and picks up the ball . CHI bounces the ball on the floor
<aft> CHI looks down at the ball
MOT pulls the ball back to her
CHI looks down at the box on the floor
CHI picks up the box and shakes it
MOT holds out the ball and looks at CHI
CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT holds out the ball and looks at CHI
CHI takes the ball from MOT and walks back over to the box
CHI drops the ball in the box
CHI stares down at the ball
MOT takes the box and puts it on the chair next to the desk
MOT gets up and reaches for something on the desk that is out of camera view
CHI takes a few steps forwards and puts his hand on the table
MOT takes the next box off the table
<aft> MOT puts the box on the floor and starts to open it
MOT takes the cloth out of the box
CHI takes a step closer to the box
MOT closes the cover of the box and puts the cloth on her lap and starts to open it up
CHI starts to back away from MOT
<bef> MOT puts the cloth on CHI's head
CHI takes the cloth off his head and throws it on the floor
MOT looks at CHI in an effort to get his attention
CHI looks at something under the desk
CHI bends down and tries to get at something under the desk
<$=1> MOT pulls CHI to his feet and over by her
CHI tries to open the box
MOT puts the cloth on CHI's head again
CHI takes the cloth off of his head and drops it on the floor
CHI pushes the cover off the box and kneels in it
CHI turns and looks at MOT
<$=1> MOT covers herself with the cloth
<aft> CHI leans back in the box
CHI leans forward and looks at MOT
CHI leans back in the box again
CHI looks at the box and then up at MOT
CHI looks at MOT and smiles
<bef> MOT raises the cloth briefly in front of her face
CHI crawls over the boxes towards the wall
CHI stares at MOT briefly then shakes his head and turns back towards the wall
CHI is refusing an indirect request by MOT
CHI starts crawling towards the wall
CHI grabs at the outlet on the wall
MOT pulls CHI away from the outlet
CHI puts both hands on the box cover
MOT shakes her head and looks at CHI sternly
MOT spreads the cloth on the floor
CHI turns to the wall and reaches for something
MOT starts to fold the cloth
CHI is holding onto something on the wall that is not in camera view
CHI walks over and reaches for something on the desk
<aft> MOT puts the cloth in the box
CHI pulls out the top desk drawer
<aft> MOT puts the cover on the box
MOT picks up the box and comes over to the desk with it
CHI glances at MOT briefly and then looks back at the drawer
MOT closes the drawer . <aft> MOT stands up
CHI pulls out the bottom desk drawer
MOT takes the ball box and puts it on top of the peekaboo box on the table
CHI looks up at the desk
MOT pushes all the drawers closed
MOT takes the next box off the desk
CHI tries to open one of the drawers
MOT holds her hand on the drawer
MOT puts the box on the floor
CHI walks over to the box
CHI looks at the contents of the box
MOT picks up a crayon and a piece of paper
CHI violently reaches in the box and picks up a crayon
MOT draws briefly then stops . <aft> MOT holds the crayon out to CHI
<bef> CHI takes the crayon from MOT . CHI squats down over the paper and holds the crayon over it
MOT moves so that she is opposite CHI
MOT leans forward and looks at the paper in the box
< .1-1> CHI draws with the crayon in one hand while he holds the other crayon . <aft> CHI draws with his other hand also
MOT leans forward and looks at the paper in the box
CHI colors violently with a crayon and then stops to climb into the box
CHI tips over backwards in the box
<aft> MOT pulls the box towards her
CHI holds up a crayon and then starts to draw with it
the cover of the box falls on to CHI
CHI stops drawing and moves out from underneath the cover
MOT moves the box over and removes the cover
CHI picks up a crayon and starts to eat it
MOT pulls CHI's arm away from his mouth
CHI pulls back away from MOT so that she can't reach the crayon
CHI stays turned away from MOT holding his crayon
CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT holds the crayon on the paper as if she is going to draw with it
CHI watches MOT and extends one of his hands
CHI looks down and examines his crayon
a noise is heard in the hall
CHI starts to eat his crayon
<bef> MOT throws her crayon down on the page and pulls the crayon out of CHI's mouth
MOT leans close to CHI and looks in his face
CHI grabs a different crayon out of the box and tries to eat it
MOT takes the crayon away from CHI
MOT waves the crayon in front of CHI
CHI reaches for the crayon and then pulls his hand back
MOT puts her crayon on the paper
CHI reaches out and tries to grab MOT's crayon
MOT pulls the crayon back out of CHI's reach
CHI grabs a crayon and puts it in his mouth
<bef> MOT pulls the crayon out of CHI's mouth . MOT picks up all of the other crayons in the box
<bef> CHI reaches in the box and pulls the paper back in frustration
CHI looks at MOT and points
a man's voice is heard in the background of the tape
MOT holds the crayons out to CHI
CHI reaches out and takes the crayon from MOT
CHI holds the crayon up in front of him and looks at it
CHI puts the crayon in his mouth
MOT grabs CHI's arm and pulls the crayon away from his mouth
CHI puts the crayon down at his side
CHI picks up the crayon and then starts to put it in his mouth
MOT takes the crayon out of CHI's mouth . <aft> MOT starts to take the crayon out of CHI's hand
CHI resists MOT and lies on the floor
MOT starts to pick up the paper on the floor
CHI points to the crayons in MOT's hands as he watches MOT
MOT piles the paper in the box neatly
<bef> CHI points to the box of paper and looks at it then CHI looks up at MOT
<$=1> MOT sits back and looks at CHI
CHI points to the crayons MOT has in her hand
CHI points to the crayons in MOT's hand
MOT pulls the crayons closer to her
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI walks away from MOT over to the desk
<4-5> MOT pokes CHI in the back . < .5- .8> MOT picks up the papers on the floor and puts them in the box with the crayons
CHI is reaching for something on the desk that is out of camera view
intonation indicates MOT is forbidding CHI's act
MOT puts the cover on the box
MOT reaches out and grabs CHI's arm
CHI is making noises but since CHI is completely out of camera view and there is no way of knowing what is being done at the desk
<aft> MOT pushes the cover down on the box
CHI walks over to the box
MOT looks CHI in face and widens eyes
MOT picks up the box and puts it on the other boxes at the table
CHI opens the bottom desk drawer and shakes the object from the forbidden object task
<bef> MOT takes the next box and puts it on the floor . MOT pulls the object away from CHI
CHI's attention is fixed on the object
MOT pulls the object away from CHI and places it in the drawer
CHI reaches out for the object as he stares at it
MOT looks at the box on the floor
CHI walks over to the box
MOT opens the box and takes the ball box off of the table
CHI picks up the book and starts turning the pages
CHI holds the book up in front of him and stares at it
MOT pushes the box cover out of the way and sits on the floor
CHI flips through the pages of the book and then accidentally drops it on the floor
CHI picks up the book and hands it to MOT
MOT takes the book from CHI
MOT pats her lap and looks at CHI
MOT takes CHI and puts him on her lap
MOT holds the book in front of CHI
MOT points to the other page and looks at CHI
CHI looks at the page blankly
CHI tries to get out of MOT's arms
CHI leans to the opposite side of CHI and looks at him in an effort to get his attention
CHI walks over to the desk and opens the bottom drawer
MOT puts her hand on the object
MOT looks up on CHI while she continues to hold down the object
CHI takes his hands off of the object
MOT looks up on CHI while she continues to hold down the object
CHI whines and squats down on the floor
CHI tries to pull the drawer open
CHI walks over to the boxes at the table
CHI pulls a box off the table
CHI picks up the box and drops it and then walks over to the book box
CHI reaches in the box and takes out the book
CHI stands in front of MOT flipping the book between his hand and looking around the room
MOT closes the cover of the box
voices are heard somewhere outside the room
CHI looks around the room to see where the voices are coming from
MOT pulls CHI onto her lap
MOT takes the book and starts to open it
End of PCI - Book . INV enters the room
